src/scss/_variables--colors.scss

Colors

Here is the color palatee for the ACME site. All colors on the site (that aren’t defined in 3rd party plugins) are defined below. Even if the color is only used once.

The $shade-- colors have an alpha transparency, so they are shown on top of a gray/white stripped background to show the translucency of the color.

Use the Name that Color site to generate color names. It’s much easier than dreaming up a name for the fourth blue the designer wants you to use.

#cf3149
used 15 times
$brickRed
#e28391
used 12 times
$deepBlush
#313149
used 13 times
$martinique
#fff
used 8 times
$white
#0054ad
used 1 time
$endeavour
rgba(49,49,73,0.1)
used 4 times
$shade--martinique10
